image.general: A professional illustration representing UAE and GCC business landscape. Show a modern city skyline with business professionals in traditional and western attire discussing business. Professional, clean, corporate style.
image.market_update: A data visualization showing economic indicators for UAE and GCC markets. Include charts, upward trends, and financial district backdrop of Dubai or Abu Dhabi.
image.sector_focus: A detailed illustration of [SECTOR] innovation in the UAE. Show cutting-edge technology, professionals collaborating, and UAE architectural elements in the background.
image.us_uae_relations: A professional illustration of US-UAE business cooperation. Include elements symbolizing both countries like flags, landmark buildings, and business professionals shaking hands.
image.investment_opportunities: A visual showing investment growth in UAE/GCC. Include upward charts, construction sites, real estate developments, and modern infrastructure with UAE architectural elements.
image.week_in_review: A weekly business review visualization for UAE/GCC with 7 data points representing each day of the week. Show business professionals analyzing data with Dubai skyline in background.
image.month_in_review: A monthly business trends visualization for UAE/GCC with calendar elements and charts showing month-long progress. Include iconic UAE buildings and business professionals.
